enhanced_by.reason: The restart method initializes the iterator state, which is necessary before calling next to ensure proper iteration.
The hasNext method checks if there is a next element, which is a precondition for calling next.
The findNextNode method is directly responsible for finding the next node, which is the core functionality of the next method.
The remove method can be used to clean up the current node after it has been processed by next, ensuring no leftover state.
